analyzed: namaḥ vajra sattvāya

original: buddhayānābhisamayagotrāḥ prāvacanikāḥ kalyāṇamitraprasaṅgādvajrayān- māruhya kalpitadevatāyogasamādhisamāpannāḥ ṣaṭkoṭivyākhyābahirmukhā vajrācāryamārādhya  #
analyzed: buddha yāna abhisamaya gotrāḥ prāvacanikāḥ kalyāṇa mitra prasaṅgāt vajrayān mā āruhya kalpita devatā yoga samādhi samāpannāḥ ṣaṣ koṭi vyākhyā bahirmukhāḥ vajrācāryam ārādhya

original: yathārutaśabdārthadvāreṇa śrīguhyasamājamahāyogatantraṁ śrutvā bālaprabodhanārthaṁ tantrāduddhṛtya yathāprāptopadeśānusāreṇa kalpitade- vatāyogasya  #
analyzed: yathā ruta śabda artha dvāreṇa śrī guhyasamāja mahā yoga tantram śrutvā bāla prabodhana artham tantrāt uddhṛtya yathāprāpta upadeśa anusāreṇa kalpita deva tā yogasya
nānā śabda racanā viśeṣeṇa sādhana aṅgāni api kurvanti
tatra kecid vajra ācāryāḥ candra vajra krameṇa vajra sattva niṣpattim kalpayanti
kecid bhava utpatti krameṇa
kecid pañca ākāra abhisambodhi krameṇa
kecid jhaṭiti krameṇa vajra sattva niṣpattim kalpayanti
māṇḍaleya devatāḥ tu kecid trayodaśa icchanti
kecid ūna viśati
kecid pañcaviśati devatā nyāsam icchanti
evam asmin tantre nānā kāraṇam āśritya vajra sattva ādi devatā mūrtim niṣpādayanti

original: tadanusāreṇāpi ṭikāṁ pañjikāṁ ca kṛtvā vineyajanebhyo deśayanti ||
analyzed: tad anusāreṇa api ṭikām pañjikām ca kṛtvā vineya janebhyaḥ deśayanti

original: (3) tatra vajrayānābhiprasannāḥ śraddhānusāreṇa tattatsampradāyaṁ prāpya śrutacintā- bhāvanākrameṇa kalpitadevatāyogamabhyasyanti ||
analyzed: tatra vajra yāna abhiprasannāḥ śraddhā anusāreṇa tad tad sampradāyam prāpya śruta cintāḥ bhāvanā krameṇa kalpita devatā yogam abhyasyanti

original: imamarthavaśaṁ jñātvā mayā śrīnāgārjunapādaparamparayā samājavyākhyā- tantrānusāreṇa ṣaṭkotivyākhyādvāreṇa tantraṁ śrutvā kramadvayamadhigamya  #
analyzed: imam artha vaśam jñātvā mayā śrī nāgārjuna pāda paramparayā samāja vyākhyā tantra anusāreṇa ṣaṭka ūti vyākhyā dvāreṇa tantram śrutvā krama dvayam adhigamya
nānā prakāra utpatti krama abhiniviṣṭānām utpatti krama sādhana niḥ sandeha artham saptadaśa paṭalāt asta vyasta vajra sattva niṣpatti sūtram krameṇa uddhṛtya
melāpakaḥ kriyate

original: tatra tāvatsādhanaśravaṇānupūrvīkramaḥ pradarśayate- mantrāvadhāraṇaṁ pūrvaṁ dvitīyaṁ nyāsadeśanā |
analyzed: tatra tāvat sādhana śravaṇa ānupūrvī kramaḥ pradarśayate mantra avadhāraṇam pūrvam dvitīyam nyāsa deśanā
vyavastholiḥ tṛtīyā tu caturtham tattva darśanam

original: ityanenānukrameṇa sādhanopayikāṁ śrutvā vajragurorājñāṁ prāpya sveṣṭadevatāyāḥ purato'rdhaṁ dadyāt |
analyzed: iti anena anukrameṇa sādhana upayikām śrutvā vajra guroḥ ājñām prāpya sva iṣṭadevatāyāḥ puratas ardham dadyāt

original: tataḥ sādhako mahāṭavyādimano'nukūlapradeśe pūrvobhimukhaḥ sattvaparyaṅkeṇopaviśya sarvasattveṣu ma- (4)
analyzed: tatas sādhakaḥ mahā aṭavī ādi manaḥ anukūla pradeśe pūrva abhimukhaḥ sattva paryaṅkeṇa upaviśya sarva sattveṣu
hākaruṇā cittam utpādya sva para hita hetoḥ vakṣyamāṇa krameṇa vajra sattva padam sādhayet
asya sūtram dvādaśa paṭale mahā aṭavī pradeśeṣu phala puṣpa ādi alaṅkṛte
parvate vijane sādhyam sarva siddhi samuccayam
iti

original: tadanantaraṁ sādhakaḥ śūnyatādhimokṣeṇa prākṛtāhaṅkāramapanīya jhaṭityātmānaṁ mahāvajradhararūpaṁ śuklavarṇamadhimuñcet |
analyzed: tad anantaram sādhakaḥ śūnyatā adhimokṣeṇa prākṛta ahaṅkāram apanīya jhaṭiti ātmānam mahā vajradhara rūpam śukla varṇam adhimuñcet
asya sūtram tṛtīya paṭale ākāśa dhātu madhya stham bhāvayet buddha maṇḍalam
raśmi megha mahā vyūham buddha jvālā sama prabham
iti

original: tataḥ prathamapaṭaloktajñānapradīpavajrasamādhinyāyena vajradhṛgiti mantramuccārya tenokṣobhyarūpaṁ kṛṣṇavarṇaṁ trimukhaṁ ṣaḍbhujamātmapuraḥsthaṁ  #
analyzed: tatas prathama paṭala ukta jñāna pradīpa vajra samādhi nyāyena vajradhṛk iti mantram uccārya tena ukṣobhya rūpam kṛṣṇa varṇam tri mukham ṣaṣ bhujam ātma puraḥstham
dṛṣṭvā punar tam sva kāye kṣīra udaka nyāyena anupraveśya indranīla varṇam ātmānam dve
ṣa vajra rūpam dhyāyāt

original: asya sūtraṁ prathamapaṭale- sarvatathāgata- kāyavākcittavidyāpuruṣo'kṣobhyamahāmudrāsaṁyogaparamapadena kṛṣṇasita- raktākāreṇa sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajrasya  #
analyzed: asya sūtram prathama paṭale sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta vidyā puruṣaḥ akṣobhya mahāmudrā sayoga parama padena kṛṣṇa sita rakta ākāreṇa sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta vajrasya
sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta vajre niṣīdayāmāsa iti

original: evaṁ dveṣavajrasamādhistho mantrī dīrghahūṁkāramuccārtha tajjanita- yamāntakādidaśakrodhān trimukhaṣaḍbhujān nānāpraharaṇavyagrahastān daśadigvyavasthitān  #
analyzed: evam dveṣa vajra samādhi sthaḥ mantrī dīrgha hūkāram ucca artha tad janita yama antaka ādi daśa krodhān tri mukha ṣaṣ bhujān nānā praharaṇa vyagra hastān daśa diś vyavasthitān
duṣṭa tarjana tatparān vicintayet

original: asya sūtraṁ trayodaśapaṭale- krodhā dveṣālaye jātā nityaṁ māraṇatatparāḥ |
analyzed: asya sūtram trayodaśa paṭale krodhāḥ dveṣa ālaye jātāḥ nityam māraṇa tatparāḥ
sidhyanti māraṇa arthena sādhakasya agra dharmiṇaḥ
iti

original: tato nisumbharājamadhaḥsthāne dvitīyaṁ nisumbharājaṁ nirmāyāgatya svapuraḥ sthaṁ kiṅkararūpeṇājñāṁ mārgayantaṁ vicintya caturdaśapaṭa- (6)
analyzed: tatas nisumbha rājam adhas sthāne dvitīyam nisumbha rājam nirmāya āgatya sva puras stham kiṅkara rūpeṇa ājñām mārgayantam vicintya
la ukta catur hūkāra mantreṇa ājñām dadyāt

original: tatrāyaṁ mantraḥ - oṁ sumbha nisumbha hūṁ gṛhṇa gṛhṇa hūṁ gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya hūṁ ānaya ho bhagavanvidyārāja hūṁ phaṭ ||
analyzed: tatra ayam mantraḥ om sumbha nisumbha hūm gṛhṇa gṛhṇa hūm gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya hūm ānaya ho bhagavan vidyārāja hūm phaṭ

original: tato nisumbharājaṁ daśadiśo gatvā devādivighnādhipatī- naṅkuśonākṛṣya pāśena galake baddhānīya daśakrodhānāṁ patipādayantaṁ vicintayet |
analyzed: tatas nisumbha rājam daśa diśaḥ gatvā deva ādi vighna adhipatī ākṛṣya pāśena galake baddha ānīya daśa krodhānām vicintayet

original: tato'mṛtakuṇḍalimuttaradvāre dvitīyanirmāṇaṁ saṁsthāpyātmānaṁ daśakīlarūpākāramabhinirmāya daśavighnādhipatīnāṁ śirasi nipatitaṁ vicintayet
analyzed: tatas amṛta kuṇḍalim uttara dvāre dvitīya nirmāṇam sasthāpya ātmānam daśa kīla rūpa ākāram abhinirmāya daśa vighna adhipatīnām śirasi nipatitam vicintayet

original: tato nisumbharājaṁ vyutthāya vajramudgareṇa mantramāvartyākoṭayantaṁ dhyāyāt |
analyzed: tatas nisumbha rājam vyutthāya vajra mudgareṇa mantram āvartya ākoṭayantam dhyāyāt

original: tatrāyaṁ mantraḥ- oṁ gha gha gha gha ghātaya ghātaya sarvaduṣṭān phaṭ phaṭ kīlaya kīlaya sarvapāpān phaṭ phaṭ hūṁ hūṁ hūṁ vajrakīla vajradharo  #
analyzed: tatra ayam mantraḥ om gha gha gha gha ghātaya ghātaya sarva duṣṭān phaṭ phaṭ kīlaya kīlaya sarva pāpān phaṭ phaṭ hūm hūm hūm vajrakīla vajradhara
ājñāpayati
sarva vighnānām kāya

original: vākcittavajraṁ kīlaya hūṁ hūṁ phaṭ phaṭ |
analyzed: vāc citta vajram kīlaya     phaṭ phaṭ

original: asya sūtraṁ trayodaśapaṭale- vajrāmṛtamahākrodhaṁ vajrakīlaṁ vibhāvayet |
analyzed: asya sūtram trayodaśa paṭale vajra amṛta mahākrodham vajrakīlam vibhāvayet
nikhanet daśa diśā agre tu sphuliṅga jvāla su prabham
iti
tatas ṭakkirājamantreṇa loha jala agni vāyu prākāra catuṣṭayam yathākramam bāhyatas vicintayet
tatra ayam mantraḥ ṭakki hūm jaḥ

original: tato bhrūṁkāreṇopari vajrapañjaraṁ caityamiva lohaprākāropari vyavasthitam tryakṣareṇa ca kavacam hūṁkāreṇa viśvavajramayaṁ bhūbhāgaṁ vicintayet
analyzed: tatas bhrūkāreṇa upari vajra pañjaram caityam iva loha prākāra upari vyavasthitam tri akṣareṇa ca kavacam hūkāreṇa viśva vajra mayam bhū bhāgam vicintayet
evam diś sīmābandha vajra prākāra pañjara ādi vidhi pūrvakam rakṣā cakram dhyāyāt
asya anuśasā sūtram trayodaśa paṭale
dhyāna jena samādānam yatra sthāne samācaret
anena dhyāna yogena tiṣṭhan buddhaiḥ adhiṣṭhyate
iti

original: tato dvitīyapaṭaloktayā bodhicittagāthayā rakṣācakraṁ traidhātukaṁ ca tathatāyāṁ praveśayet |
analyzed: tatas dvitīya paṭala uktayā bodhi citta gāthayā rakṣā cakram traidhātukam ca tathatāyām praveśayet

original: tatreyaṁ gāthā- abhāve bhāvanā'bhāvo bhāvanā naiva bhāvanā |
analyzed: tatra iyam gāthā abhāve bhāvanā abhāvaḥ bhāvanā na eva bhāvanā

original: iti bhāvo na bhāvaḥ syādbhāvanā nopalabhyate ||
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ na bhāvaḥ syāt bhāvanā nā upalabhyate
iti
iyam api paramā rakṣā

original: tata ākāśadhātumadhye yaṁkāreṇa dhanvākṛti vāyumaṇḍalaṁ hūṁkāradvayena pārśvayorvajradvayāṅkitaṁ vicintya tadupari raṁkāreṇa trikoṇāgnimaṇḍalaṁ  #
analyzed: tatas ākāśa dhātu madhye yakāreṇa dhanva ākṛti vāyu maṇḍalam hūkāra dvayena pārśvayoḥ vajra dvaya aṅkitam vicintya tad upari rakāreṇa trikoṇa agni maṇḍalam

original: vajradvayāṅkitam punastadupari vaṁkāreṇa vartulaṁ vāruṇamaṇḍalaṁ vajradvayāṅkitaṁ vibhāvya tadupari laṁkāreṇa caturasraṁ māhe- (9)
analyzed: vajra dvaya aṅkitam punar tad upari vakāreṇa vartulam vāruṇa maṇḍalam vajra dvaya aṅkitam vibhāvya tad upari lakāreṇa catur asram māhe

original: ndramaṇḍalaṁ vajradvayāṅkitaṁ vibhāvya maṇḍalacatuṣṭayaṁ saṁhṛtya pṛthivīmaṇḍalamātraṁ dhyāyāt |

analyzed: asya sūtram ekādaśa paṭale kha vajra madhya gatam cintet maṇḍalam sarva vajra jam
bhrūkāram bhāvayet tatra vajra megha samāvaham
iti

original: evamādhāramaṇḍalaṁ niṣpādya bhrūṁkāreṇa kūṭāgāram caturasraṁ caturdvāraṁ catustoraṇaśobhitam |
analyzed: evam ādhāra maṇḍalam niṣpādya bhrūkāreṇa kūṭāgāram catur asram catur dvāram catur toraṇa śobhitam
catur sūtra samāyuktam aṣṭa stambha upaśobhitam
khacitam vajra ratnaiḥ tu dvāra niryūha sandhiṣu
kumbha stambha mahāvajram krama śīrṣaḥ tu pakṣiṇī
ghaṇṭā patāka sa śobham cāmara ādi vibhūṣitam
iti
asya sūtram aṣṭama paṭale
yojana śata vistāram catur asram su śobhanam
catur ratna mayam caityam svaccham prakṛti nirmalam
iti

original: evaṅguṇaviśiṣṭaṁ devamanuṣyātikrāntaṁ prāsādavaraṁ pṛthivīmaṇḍalo- pari vicintya candrasūryādyāsanaṁ saṁsthāpya svayaṁ prākṛtāhaṅkāramapanīya  #
analyzed: evaṅguṇa viśiṣṭam deva manuṣya atikrāntam prāsāda varam pṛthivī maṇḍala u pari vicintya candra sūrya ādi āsanam sasthāpya svayam prākṛta ahaṅkāram apanīya

original: jhaṭiti mahāvajradhararūpamātmānamindranīlavarṇaṁ trimukhaṁ ṣaḍbhujaṁ dakṣiṇe vajraṁ cakraṁ padmaṁ vāme ghaṇṭāṁ cintāmaṇiṁ khadgaṁ sampuṭayogena  #
analyzed: jhaṭiti mahā vajradhara rūpam ātmānam indranīla varṇam tri mukham ṣaṣ bhujam dakṣiṇe vajram cakram padmam vāme ghaṇṭām cintāmaṇim khadgam sampuṭa yogena
madhya maṇḍale padma candrāsane sattva paryaṅkeṇa upaviṣṭam vicintayet

original: tataḥ pūrve vairocanam dakṣiṇe ratnasambhavam paścime'mitābham uttare'moghasiddhim agnikoṇe locanām nairṛtyāṁ māmakīm vāyavyāṁ pāṇḍaravāsinīm  #
analyzed: tatas pūrve vairocanam dakṣiṇe ratnasambhavam paścime amitābham uttare amoghasiddhim agnikoṇe locanām nairṛtyām māmakīm vāyavyām pāṇḍara vāsinīm  /

original: aiśānyāṁ tārāṁ garbhamaṇḍale pravicintya dvitīyapuṭe'gnikoṇe rūpavajrām nairṛtyāṁ śabdavajrām vāyavyāṁ gandhavajrām aiśānyāṁ rasavajrām madhye  #
analyzed: aiśānyām tārām garbha maṇḍale pravicintya dvitīya puṭe agnikoṇe rūpa vajrām nairṛtyām śabda vajrām vāyavyām gandha vajrām aiśānyām rasa vajrām madhye
sparśa vajrām va
samāliṅgya   cintayet

original: tathā tṛtīye puṭe pūrvapa- ṭṭikāyāṁ maitreyaṁ kṣitigarbham dakṣiṇapaṭṭikāyāṁ vajrapāṇiṁ khagarbham paścimapaṭṭikāyāṁ lokeśvaraṁ mañjughoṣam  #
analyzed: tathā tṛtīye puṭe pūrva pa ṭṭikāyām maitreyam kṣitigarbham dakṣiṇa paṭṭikāyām vajrapāṇim khagarbham paścima paṭṭikāyām lokeśvaram mañjughoṣam  /

original: uttarapaṭṭikāyāṁ sarvanivara- ṇaviṣkambhiṇaṁ samantabhadram pūrvadvāre yamāntakam dakṣiṇadvāre'parājitam paścimadvāre hayagrīvam uttaradvāre'mṛtakuṇḍalim  #
analyzed: uttara paṭṭikāyām sarva nivara ṇa viṣkambhiṇam samantabhadram pūrva dvāre yamāntakam dakṣiṇa dvāre aparājitam paścima dvāre hayagrīvam uttara dvāre amṛta kuṇḍalim

original: agnikoṇe'calam nairṛtyāṁ ṭakkirājam vāyavyāṁ nīladaṇḍam aiśānyāṁ mahābalam ūrdhvamuṣṇīṣacakravartinam adho nisumbharājaṁ dhyāyāt |
analyzed: agni koṇe acalam nairṛtyām ṭakkirājam vāyavyām nīladaṇḍam aiśānyām mahābalam ūrdhvam uṣṇīṣa cakravartinam adhas nisumbharājam dhyāyāt

original: asya sūtram prathamapaṭale- svacchaṁ ca tatsvabhāvaṁ ca nānārūpaṁ samantataḥ |
analyzed: asya sūtram prathama paṭale svaccham ca tad svabhāvam ca nānā rūpam samantataḥ
buddha megha samākīrṇam sphuliṅga gahana ākulam
svaccha ādi maṇḍalaiḥ yuktam sarva tāthāgatam puram
iti
evam bāhya maṇḍale dvātriśat devatā nirmāṇam adhimucya punar eṣām sva

original: kāyamaṇḍale skandhasvabhāvena pañcabuddhāndhātusvabhāvena vidyādevatā rūpādiviṣayasvabhāvena rūpavajrādikā āyatanasvabhāvena bodhisattvāna-  #
analyzed: kāya maṇḍale skandha svabhāvena pañca buddhān dhātu svabhāvena vidyā devatāḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya svabhāvena rūpa vajra ādikāḥ āyatana svabhāvena bodhisattvāna
vayava svabhāvena krodharājān vinyaset

original: asya sūtraṁ saptadaśapaṭale- pañca skandhāḥ samāsena pañca buddhāḥ prakīrtitāḥ |
analyzed: asya sūtram saptadaśa paṭale pañca skandhāḥ samāsena pañca buddhāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
vajra āyatanāni eva bodhisattva agra maṇḍalam
pṛthivī locana ākhyātā ap dhātuḥ māmakī smṛtā
tejaḥ ca pāṇḍara ākhyātā vāyuḥ tārā prakīrtitā
rūpa śabda ādibhiḥ mantrī devatāḥ bhāvayet sadā
iti
imam artha vaśam jñātvā āha bhagavān sarva buddha samāyoga ḍākinījāla sa vara mahā yogatantre
a tattva āśaya yogānām devatā ālambanam prati
pratibimba mayaḥ yogaḥ niṣikta ādiṣu jāyate
su tattva āśaya yogānām devatā ālambanena kim
ātma yoga sva samayāt sidhyate paramākṣaram
ātmā vai sarva buddha tvam sarva sauri tvam eva ca
tasmāt sarva prayatnena hi ātmānam pūjayet sadā
iti

original: evaṁ bāhyamaṇḍalaṁ kāyamaṇḍale'nupraveśya sarvatathāgataparamāṇu- parighaṭitaṁ svakāyamaṇḍalamadhimucya punaḥ kāyamaṇḍaladevatānskandha- dhātvāyatanasvabhāvān  #
analyzed: evam bāhya maṇḍalam kāya maṇḍale anupraveśya sarva tathāgata paramāṇu parighaṭitam sva kāya maṇḍalam adhimucya punar kāya maṇḍala devatān skandha dhātu āyatana svabhāvān  /

original: yathānukrameṇa linānparamārthamaṇḍale praveśya tṛtīyapaṭalokta-oṁ śunyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako'hamitimantreṇa dharmakāyaṁ dṛḍhīkuryāt |
analyzed: yathā anukrameṇa linān paramārtha maṇḍale praveśya tṛtīya paṭala ukta om śunyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmakaḥ aham iti mantreṇa dharmakāyam dṛḍhīkuryāt
asya sūtram saptama paṭale
samayāt kṣaret retam vidhinā pibet phala kāṅkṣayā
mārayet tāthāgatam vyūham sutarām siddhim āpnuyāt

original: evaṁ śūnyatālambanena sakalakleśamalaṁ prakṣālya tasmādātmānaṁ vajrasattvamahāmudrārūpaṁ niṣpādayedanena krameṇa |
analyzed: evam śūnyatā ālambanena sakala kleśa malam prakṣālya tasmāt ātmānam vajra sattva mahāmudrā rūpam niṣpādayet anena krameṇa

original: tatrāyaṁ kramaḥ - paramārthasatyātsūryamaṇḍalam tadupari candramaṇḍalaṁ punastadupari raktāṣṭadalapadmaṁ padmopari oṁ āḥ hūṁ ityakṣaratrayamuparyupari  #
analyzed: tatra ayam kramaḥ paramārtha satyāt sūrya maṇḍalam tad upari candra maṇḍalam punar tad upari rakta aṣṭadala padmam padma upari om āḥ   iti akṣara trayam upari upari

original: vinyasya sarvaṁ saṁhṛtya paripūrṇacadramaṇḍalākārapariṇataṁ cittamātraṁ dhyātvā tasmiñjagatsthāvarajaṅgamamantarbhāvya tṛtīyapaṭalokta-oṁ dharma-  #
analyzed: vinyasya sarvam sahṛtya paripūrṇa cadra maṇḍala ākāra pariṇatam cittamātram dhyātvā tasmin jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam antar bhāvya tṛtīya paṭala ukta om dharma
dhātu svabhāva ātmakaḥ aham iti mantreṇa sva citta ratnam dṛḍhīkuryāt
iti ayam prathamaḥ yogaḥ
imam artham dyotayan āha savare jñāna mātra samāpattiḥ yogaḥ iti abhidhīyate
iti
tatas candra maṇḍala upari tri akṣaram tasmāt vajram vajrāt mahā vajradhara
rūpam ātmānam śukla varṇam dhyāyāt
vajra sattvaḥ mahā rājā vairocana sama prabhaḥ
iti pañcadaśa paṭale vacanāt
dvitīyaḥ anuyogaḥ
asya sūtram ekādaśa paṭale tri vajra akṣara mantra agraiḥ mahāmudrā vibhāvanam
kartavyam jñāna vajreṇa sarva bodhi samāvaham
iti

original: evaṁ yogānuyogakrameṇātmānaṁ sambhogakāyaṁ sampādya carama- bhavikavatsattvārthaṁ prati skandhadhātvāyatanānupraveśena nirmāṇakāyamātmānaṁ  #
analyzed: evam yoga anuyoga krameṇa ātmānam sambhoga kāyam sampādya bhavika vat sattva artham prati skandha dhātu āyatana anupraveśena nirmāṇa kāyam ātmānam
niṣpādayet enena krameṇa

original: tatrāyaṁ kramaḥ - oṁkāraṁ śuklavarṇaṁ vairocanātmakaṁ mastake vinyasya rūpaskandhaṁ praveśayet |
analyzed: tatra ayam kramaḥ okāram śukla varṇam vairocana ātmakam mastake vinyasya rūpa skandham praveśayet

original: evamāḥkāraṁ raktavarṇamamitābhātmakaṁ mukhe vinyasya sañjñāskandhaṁ praveśayet |
analyzed: evam āḥkāram rakta varṇam amita ābha ātmakam mukhe vinyasya sañjñā skandham praveśayet

original: hūṁkāraṁ kṛṣṇavarṇamakṣobhyātmakaṁ hṛdaye vinyasya vijñānaskandhaṁ prave- (16) śayet |
analyzed: hūkāram kṛṣṇa varṇam akṣobhya ātmakam hṛdaye vinyasya vijñāna skandham śayet

original: svākāraṁ pītavarṇaṁ ratnasambhavātmakaṁ nābhau vinyasya vedanā- skandhaṁ praveśayet |
analyzed: su ākāram pīta varṇam ratna sambhava ātmakam nābhau vinyasya vedanā skandham praveśayet
hākāram harita varṇam amogha siddhi ātmakam pādayoḥ vinyasya saskāra skandham praveśayet

original: moharatīti locanāṁ pṛthivīdhātusvabhāvena dveṣaratīti māmakī- mabdhātusvabhāvena rāgaratīti pāṇḍarāṁ tejodhātusvabhāvena vajraratīti tārāṁ  #
analyzed: moha ratī iti locanām pṛthivī dhātu svabhāvena dveṣa ratī iti māmakī mad dhātu svabhāvena rāga ratī iti pāṇḍarām tejaḥ dhātu svabhāvena vajra ratī iti tārām

original: vāyudhātusvabhāvena vinyasya kharatvaṁ dravatāmauṣṇyaṁ preraṇatvaṁ prakalpayet ||
analyzed: vāyu dhātu svabhāvena vinyasya khara tvam drava tām auṣṇyam preraṇa tvam prakalpayet

original: thlīṁ kṣitigarbhaṁ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena oṁ vajrapāṇiṁ śrotrā- yatanasvarūpeṇa oṁ ākāśagarbhaṁ ghrāṇāyatanarūpeṇa oṁ lokeśvaraṁ jihvāyatanasvarūpeṇa  #
analyzed: thlīṃ kṣitigarbham cakṣuḥ āyatana svabhāvena om vajrapāṇim śrotrā yatana sva rūpeṇa om ākāśagarbham ghrāṇa āyatana rūpeṇa om lokeśvaram jihvā āyatana sva rūpeṇa

original: hūṁ mañjuśriyaṁ mana āyatanasvarūpeṇa oṁ sarva- nivaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaṁ kāyāyatanasvarūpeṇa vinyasya divyalocanādīnpra- kalpayet |
analyzed: hūm mañjuśriyam manaḥ āyatana sva rūpeṇa om sarva nivaraṇa viṣkambhiṇam kāya āyatana sva rūpeṇa vinyasya divya locana ādīn kalpayet
maibījam maitreyam snāyu svabhāvena nyaset
sa bījam samanta bhadram sarva śarīra sandhi svabhāvena nyaset iti
evam mantra adhiṣṭhāne skandha dhātu āyatanam āpūrya dīrgha hūkārān daśa

original: krodhānbhujādyavayave vinyasedanena krameṇa- tatra dakṣiṇabhuje yamā- ntakam vāmabhuje'parājitam mukhe hayagrīvam guhye'mṛ- takuṇḍalim dakṣiṇabāhāvacalam  #
analyzed: krodhān bhuja ādi avayave vinyaset anena krameṇa tatra dakṣiṇa bhuje yama antakam vāma bhuje aparājitam mukhe hayagrīvam guhye amṛta kuṇḍalim dakṣiṇa bāhau acalam

original: vāmabāhau ṭakkirājam dakṣiṇajānau nīladaṇḍam vāmajānau mahābalam mūrdhnyuṣṇīṣacakra- vartinam pādayorni sumbharājaṁ vinyasya daśadiśo'nupraveśayediti
analyzed: vāma bāhau ṭakkirājam dakṣiṇa jānau nīladaṇḍam vāma jānau mahābalam mūrdhni uṣṇīṣa cakra vartinam pādayoḥ ni sumbharājam vinyasya daśa diśaḥ anupraveśayet iti

original: asya sūtraṁ prathamapaṭale - mahāvidyāpuruṣamūrtiṁ sarvatathāgata- mantrādhiṣṭhānamadhiṣṭhāpayāmāsa |
analyzed: asya sūtram prathama paṭale mahāvidyā puruṣa mūrtim sarva tathāgata mantra adhiṣṭhānam adhiṣṭhāpayāmāsa

original: samanantarādhiṣṭhitamātre sa eva bhagavānbo- dhicittavajrastathāgatastrimukhākāreṇa sarvatathāgataiḥ sandṛśyate smeti |
analyzed: samanantara adhiṣṭhita mātre saḥ eva bhagavān bodhi citta vajraḥ tathāgataḥ tri mukha ākāreṇa sarva tathāgataiḥ san dṛśyate sma iti
tṛtīyaḥ atiyogaḥ

original: evaṁ sādhako yogatrayeṇātmanaḥ prākṛtāhaṅkāramapanīya śrīvajra- sattvarūpaṁ niṣpādya punarghaṭamānaniṣpannadevatāvikalpāpanayanārthaṁ caturthaṁ  #
analyzed: evam sādhakaḥ yoga trayeṇa ātmanaḥ prākṛta ahaṅkāram apanīya śrīvajra sattva rūpam niṣpādya punar ghaṭamāna niṣpanna devatā vikalpa apanayana artham caturtham
mahā yogam kuryāt

original: tatra oṁkāraṁ śuklavarṇaṁ mastake dhyātvā ta- jjanitalocanāvyūhamādhipatyaprayogeṇa gaganakuhare vicintayet |
analyzed: tatra okāram śukla varṇam mastake dhyātvā tat janita locanā vyūham ādhipatya prayogeṇa gagana kuhare vicintayet
tatas jhaṭiti vairocana vyūham ādhipatya prayogeṇa antarīkṣe dṛṣṭvā
lokta gāthā dvayena adhyeṣayet
tatra iyam gāthā buddha kāya dharaḥ śrīmān tri vajra abhedya bhāvitaḥ
adhiṣṭhāna padam me adya karotu kāya vajriṇaḥ
daśa diś sasthitāḥ buddhāḥ tri vajra abhedya bhāvitāḥ
adhiṣṭhāna padam me adya kurvantu kāya vajriṇaḥ

original: adhyeṣaṇānantaraṁ devatāvyūhamanyonyānurāgaṇapūrvakaṁ paramānandasukhama- nubhūya śvetaśmisvabhāvena jñānasattvavadvairocanadvāreṇa praviśya  #
analyzed: adhyeṣaṇa anantaram devatā vyūham anyonya anurāgaṇa pūrvakam paramānanda sukham anubhūya śveta aśmi svabhāvena jñāna sattva vat vairocana dvāreṇa praviśya

original: jñānabhūmiṁ prāpya samastakāyamāpūrya prīṇayantaṁ vicintya saptamapaṭaloktagāthayā dṛ- ḍhīkuryāt |
analyzed: jñāna bhūmim prāpya samasta kāyam āpūrya prīṇayantam vicintya saptama paṭala ukta gāthayā dṛ ḍhīkuryāt
tatra iyam gāthā yatkāyam sarva buddhānām pañca skandha prapūrītam
buddha kāya svabhāvena mama api tādṛśam bhavet
iti

original: tataḥ ṣaṣṭhapaṭaloktamantreṇādvayāhaṅkāraṁ kuryāt- oṁ sarvatathā- gatakāyavajrasvabhāvātmako'hamiti ||
analyzed: tatas ṣaṣṭha paṭala ukta mantreṇa advaya ahaṅkāram kuryāt om sarva tathā gata kāya vajra svabhāva ātmakaḥ aham iti
vāc cittayoḥ api anena eva krameṇa adhiṣṭhānam kuryāt

original: tatrāyaṁ kramaḥ- āḥkāraṁ raktavarṇaṁ mukhapadmopari vinyasya tajjanitapāṇḍaravāsinī- vyūhairgaganamāpūrya pūrvavadamitābhavyūhaṁ dṛṣṭvādhyeṣayedanayā  #
analyzed: tatra ayam kramaḥ āḥkāram rakta varṇam mukha padma upari vinyasya tad janita pāṇḍara vāsinī vyūhaiḥ gaganam āpūrya pūrvavat amita ābha vyūham dṛṣṭvā adhyeṣayet anayā  /
gāthayā dharmaḥ vai vākpathaḥ śrīmāḥ tri vajra abhedya bhāvitaḥ
adhiṣṭhāna padam me adya karotu vāc vajriṇaḥ
daśa diś sasthitāḥ buddhāḥ tri vajra abhedya bhāvitāḥ
adhiṣṭhāna padam me adya kurvantu vāc vajriṇaḥ

original: evamadhyeṣite pūrvavaddvayendriyasamāpattyā mahārāgānalena vyūhadvayaṁ dravībhūya raktaraśmirūpeṇa mukhe praviśyāśeṣavāgaiśvaryamāpādayantaṁ  #
analyzed: evam adhyeṣite pūrvavat dvaya indriya samāpattyā mahā rāga analena vyūha dvayam dravībhūya rakta raśmi rūpeṇa mukhe praviśya aśeṣa vāc aiśvaryam āpādayantam

original: vicintya dṛḍhīkuryādanayā gāthayā- yadeva vajradharmasya vācā niruktisampadaḥ |
analyzed: vicintya dṛḍhīkuryāt anayā gāthayā yat eva vajradharmasya vācā nirukti sampadaḥ
mama api tādṛśī vācā bhavet dharmadhara upamā
iti
tatas anena mantreṇa a dvaidhīkāra ahaṅkāram kuryāt
tatra ayam mantraḥ om sarva tathāgata vāc vajra svabhāva ātmakaḥ aham iti

original: tataḥ svahṛdi vajravaraṭake kṛṣṇavarṇaṁ hūṁkāraṁ vicintya tajjanita- māmakīvyūhaṁ gaganakuhare vicintya pūrvavajjhaṭityakṣobhyavyūhaṁ cāntarīkṣe  #
analyzed: tatas sva hṛdi vajra varaṭake kṛṣṇa varṇam hūkāram vicintya tad janita māmakī vyūham gagana kuhare vicintya pūrvavat jhaṭiti akṣobhya vyūham ca antarīkṣe
dṛṣṭvā prārthayet anayā gāthayā vajra citta dharaḥ śrīmān tri vajra abhedya bhāvitaḥ
adhiṣṭhāna padam me adya karotu citta vajriṇaḥ
daśa diś sasthitāḥ buddhāḥ tri vajra abhedya bhāvitāḥ
adhiṣṭhāna padam me adya kurvantu citta vajriṇaḥ

original: prārthanānantaraṁ pūrvavadvyūhadvayaṁ mahārāgānalena dravībhūya kṛṣṇaraśmirūpeṇa hṛdaye praviśya cittaiśvaryaṁ sampādayantaṁ vicintya dṛḍhīkuryādanayā  #
analyzed: prārthanā anantaram pūrvavat vyūha dvayam mahā rāga analena dravībhūya kṛṣṇa raśmi rūpeṇa hṛdaye praviśya citta aiśvaryam sampādayantam vicintya dṛḍhīkuryāt anayā
gāthayā yat cittam samantabhadrasya guhyaka indrasya dhīmataḥ
mama api tādṛśam cittam bhavet vajradhara upamam
iti
tatas anena a dvaidhīkāra ahaṅkāram kuryāt om sarva tathāgata cittava jra svabhāva ātmakaḥ aham iti

original: evaṁ kulatrayapraveśena kāyavākcittaṁ pṛthagadhiṣṭhāya punastrivajrā- bhedyasvabhāvena mahāvajradharādhiṣṭhānaṁ kuryādanena krameṇa- oṁ sarva-  #
analyzed: evam kula traya praveśena kāya vāc cittam pṛthak adhiṣṭhāya punar trivajrā bhedya svabhāvena mahā vajradhara adhiṣṭhānam kuryāt anena krameṇa om sarva
tathāgata kāya vāc citta vajra svabhāva ātmakaḥ aham iti

original: asya sūtraṁ dvitīya- paṭale- utpādayantu bhavantaścittaṁ kāyākāreṇa kāyaṁ cittākāreṇa cittaṁ vākpravyāhāreṇeti |
analyzed: asya sūtram dvitīya paṭale utpādayantu bhavantaḥ cittam kāya ākāreṇa kāyam citta ākāreṇa cittam vāc pravyāhāreṇa iti
prathama paṭala ukta samaya udbhava vajra samādhi nyāyena niṣpanna tvāt samayasattvaḥ iti ucyate

original: evaṁ trimukhaṁ ṣaḍbhujaṁ samayasattvaṁ niṣpādya tasya hṛdaye jñānasattvaṁ dvibhujaṁ raktavarṇaṁ sampuṭayogena sarvaśarīraṁ prīṇayantaṁ vicintya  #
analyzed: evam tri mukham ṣaṣ bhujam samaya sattvam niṣpādya tasya hṛdaye jñāna sattvam dvi bhujam rakta varṇam sampuṭa yogena sarva śarīram prīṇayantam vicintya
sva mukuṭe adhipati dhyāyāt
asya sūtram dvādaśa paṭale sarva ākāra vara upetam sva kāya vāc citta vajriṇam
hṛdaye jñāna samayam mukuṭe vajra agra dhāriṇam
prīṇanam sarva buddhānām idam samayam uttamam
kartavyam samaya agreṇa sarva siddhi karam param

original: evaṁ samayasattvahṛdaye jñānasattvaṁ vicintya jñānasattvasyāpi hṛdaye hūṁkāraṁ samādhisattvākhyaṁ satatodayaṁ bṛhatpradīpasadṛśamajñānāndhakāra-  #
analyzed: evam samaya sattva hṛdaye jñāna sattvam vicintya jñāna sattvasya api hṛdaye hūkāram samādhi sattva ākhyam satata udayam bṛhat pradīpa sadṛśam ajñāna andhakāra
vidhamana artham āloka puñja ākāram dhyāyāt iti
asya sūtram ekādaśa paṭale buddha maṇḍala madhya stham vajra akṣobhyam prabhāvayet

original: hūṁkāraṁ hṛdaye dhyātvā cittaṁ bindugataṁ nyaset ||
analyzed: hūkāram hṛdaye dhyātvā cittam bindu gatam nyaset
iti
mahā yogaḥ

original: evaṁ yogacatuṣṭayenātmānaṁ trisattvātmakaṁ svārthasampatsvabhāvaṁ samādhirājāgrīṁ niṣpādyedānīṁ parārthasampattaye maṇḍalarājāgrīsamādhipra-  #
analyzed: evam yoga catuṣṭayena ātmānam tri sattva ātmakam svārtha sampad svabhāvam samādhi rājāgrīm niṣpādya idānīm parārtha sampattaye maṇḍala rājāgrī samādhi pra
darśanāya pīṭhikā avatāryate

original: bhagavāñchākyamuniḥ sarvaṁ kṛtvā tuṣitava- rabhuvanādavatīrya vītarāgarūpamabhinirmāya śrāvakagotrāñchāvakamārge pratiṣṭhāpya punarmahāyānikabodhisattvānāṁ  #
analyzed: bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvam kṛtvā tuṣita va ra bhuvanāt avatīrya vīta rāga rūpam abhinirmāya śrāvaka gotrān śāvaka mārge pratiṣṭhāpya punar mahāyānika bodhisattvānām
pāramitā mārgam prakāśya
gambhīra adhimuktikānām rāga ja bodhi pradarśana artham etat

original: tatra prathamapaṭalo- ktamahārāganayaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpannastathā ghaṭamānayogināpyā- diyogaṁ kṛtvā rāgacaritasattvānāṁ kāmamokṣapradarśanāya  #
analyzed: tatra prathama paṭala u kta mahārāga nayam nāma samādhim samāpannaḥ tathā kṛtvā rāga carita sattvānām kāma mokṣa pradarśanāya
saptadaśa paṭala ukta sarva kāma upabhoga samādhinā vihartavyam anena krameṇa

original: tatrāyaṁ kramaḥ -- sarvalakṣaṇopetāṁ bāhyāṅganāṁ mantratantrasuśikṣitāmādāya purato'va- sthāpya pañcakulakalāpinīṁ kuryāt |
analyzed: tatra ayam kramaḥ sarva lakṣaṇa upetām bāhya aṅganām mantra tantra su śikṣitām ādāya puratas ava sthāpya pañca kula kalāpinīm kuryāt

original: tato vajrapadmasaṁskārapūrvakaṁ dvaye- ndriyasamāpattiṁ kṛtvā bodhicittādakṣobhyādimaṇḍalacakramabhinirmāya ta- ttatsamādhinā sattvānāṁ dveṣādikleśānviśodhya  #
analyzed: tatas vajra padma saskāra pūrvakam dvaye indriya samāpattim kṛtvā bodhi cittāt akṣobhya ādi maṇḍala cakram abhinirmāya tad tad samādhinā sattvānām dveṣa ādi kleśān viśodhya
punar ānīya sva kāyam a ṇḍale praveśayet

original: atha vā svahṛdayājjñānamudrāmabhinirmāya tayā saha samāpattiṁ kṛtvā mantraikanirmāṇātsattvārthaṁ kuryāt |
analyzed: atha vā sva hṛdayāt jñānamudrām abhinirmāya tayā saha samāpattim kṛtvā mantra eka nirmāṇāt sattva artham kuryāt
hṛdaya sthā mahādevī yoginām yoga vāhinī
jananī sarva buddhānām vajradhātu īśvarī smṛtā
iti sarva rahasya tantre vacanāt

original: asya sūtraṁ saptamapaṭale- tāṁ ṣoḍaśābdikāṁ prāpya yoṣitaṁ kāntisuprabhām |
analyzed: asya sūtram saptama paṭale tām ṣoḍaśa ābdikām prāpya yoṣitam kānti su prabhām
pracchanne prārabhet pūjām adhiṣṭhāna padaiḥ tribhiḥ
tāthāgatīm mahā bhāryā locanām vā vibhāvayet
dvaya indriya samāpattyā buddha siddhim avāpnuyāt
iti
evam bāhya ādhyātmika mudrām niścitya idānīm pañcakula kalāpinī kramaḥ pradarśyate

original: oṁkāraṁ śirasyāḥkāraṁ mukhe hūṁ hṛdaye svā nābhau hā pāda- yornyaset |
analyzed: okāram śirasi āḥkāram mukhe hūm hṛdaye svā nābhau hā pāda yoḥ nyaset
catur dhātu svabhāvena locana ādīḥ nyaset
rūpa ādi viṣaya svabhāvena rūpa vajra ādīḥ nyaset
punar tasyāḥ bhuja ādi avayaveṣu krodha rājñīḥ nyaset

original: tatra dakṣiṇabhuje vajravetālīṁ vāmabhuje'parājitāṁ mukhe bhṛ- (25)
analyzed: tatra dakṣiṇa bhuje vajra vetālīm vāma bhuje aparājitām mukhe

original: kuṭiṁ guhya ekajaṭāṁ punardakṣiṇabāhau viśvavajrīṁ vāmabāhau viśvaratnīṁ dakṣiṇajānau viśvapadmīṁ vāmajānau viśvakarmīṁ mūrghni gaganavajriṇīṁ  #
analyzed: kuṭim guhye eka jaṭām punar dakṣiṇa bāhau viśvavajrīm vāma bāhau viśvaratnīm dakṣiṇa jānau viśvapadmīm vāma jānau viśvakarmīm mūrghni gaganavajriṇīm
pādayoḥ dharaṇīn dharīm nyaset iti

original: asya sūtramaṣṭamapaṭale- stanāntaraṁ yāvacchikhāntamadhye caraṇāntare cāpi nyasedvidhijñaḥ |
analyzed: asya sūtram aṣṭama paṭale stanāntaram yāvat śikhā anta madhye caraṇa antare ca api nyaset vidhi jñaḥ
nābhi kaṭī guhya jina ātmajānām nyāsam prakuryāt kula pañcakānām
iti
evam abhisaskṛtya prākṛta strī bhāvam apanīya vajrapadma saskāram kuryāt anena krameṇa

original: hūṁkāreṇa svaliṅgaṁ pañcasūcikaṁ vajraṁ vicintya madhyasūcau praṇavaṁ nyasediti vajrasaṁskāraḥ |
analyzed: hūkāreṇa sva liṅgam pañca sūcikam vajram vicintya madhya sūcau praṇavam nyaset iti vajra saskāraḥ

original: āḥkāraṁ tasyā dharmodaye vinyasya tajjanita- raktāṣṭadalapadmaṁ dhyāyāditi padmasaṁskāraḥ |
analyzed: āḥkāram tasyāḥ dharma udaye vinyasya tad janita rakta aṣṭadala padmam dhyāyāt iti padma saskāraḥ

original: asya sūtraṁ saptamapaṭale- hūṁkāraṁ ca oṁkāraṁ ca phaṭkāraṁ ca vikalpayet |
analyzed: asya sūtram saptama paṭale hūkāram ca okāram ca phaṭkāram ca vikalpayet
pañca raśmi samākīrṇam vajram padmam ca bhāvayet
iti
tatas ratna sambhava ahaṅkāravān anyonya anurāgaṇa pūrvakam āliṅgana cumbana ā dikam kṛtvā ṣaṣṭha paṭala ukta mantreṇa advaya ahaṅkāram kuryāt
tatra ayam mantraḥ om sarva tathāgata anurāgaṇa vajra svabhāva ātmakaḥ aham iti ratna sambha va adhiṣṭhānam
tatas hūkāra gītam udāharan yoṣit karma sthaḥ bhavet
kṣaraṇa avasthāyām phaṭkāra mantram uccārayet

original: tataḥ kāyamāṇḍaleyadevatāḥ para- mānandasukhamanubhūya nāḍīvivarādbindurūpeṇa padmamadhye nipatanti |
analyzed: tatas kāyamāṇḍaleya devatāḥ para ma ānanda sukham anubhūya nāḍī vivarāt bindu rūpeṇa padma madhye nipatanti
asya sūtram prathama paṭale sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta hṛdaya vajra yoṣit bhageṣu vijahāra iti
evam bodhi citta avasthāyām amogha siddhi adhiṣṭhānam adhimucya ṣaṣṭha pa ṭala ukta pūjāmantreṇa advaya ahaṅkāram kuryāt
tatra ayam mantraḥ om sarva tathāgata pūjā vajra svabhāva ātmakaḥ aham iti

original: evaṁ pañcatathāgatānupraveśenātmānamadhiṣṭhāya samādhyabhiṣekapūjā- paryantaṁ sarvakulātmakāhaṅkāraṁ kṛtvā parārthasampattaye bhavotpattikrameṇa
analyzed: evam pañca tathāgata anupraveśena ātmānam adhiṣṭhāya samādhi abhiṣeka pūjā paryantam sarva kula ātmaka ahaṅkāram kṛtvā parārtha sampattaye bhava utpatti krameṇa
maṇḍala cakram utsṛjet
tatra akṣobhya samādhinā sattvānām dveṣa kleśa viśuddhim karoti
evam vairocana samādhinā moha viśuddhim
ratna sambhava samādhinā māna viśuddhim
amita ābha samādhinā
amogha siddhi samādhinā īrṣyā viśuddhim

original: sa eva bhagavānlo- canāsamādhinā sattvānāṁ śāntiṁ karoti |
analyzed: saḥ eva bhagavān lo canā samādhinā sattvānām śāntim karoti
māmakī samādhinā puṣṭim
pāṇḍara vāsinī samādhinā rakṣām
tārā samādhinā vaśyam karoti

original: sa eva bhagavāntrūpavajrādikā bhūtvā sattvānāṁ sukhasaumanasya- māpādayati |
analyzed: saḥ eva bhagavān trūpa vajra ādikāḥ bhūtvā sattvānām sukha saumanasyam āpādayati
saḥ eva bhagavān kṣitigarbha ādi bodhisattva samādhibhiḥ sattvānām āyatana viśuddhim karoti
saḥ eva bhagavān yama antaka ādi krodha samādhibhiḥ daśa diś vighna gaṇāḥ tarjayati
sarva yogaḥ hi bhagavān vajra sattvaḥ tathāgataḥ
tasya upabhogam sarvam vai traidhātukam aśeṣatas
iti vacanāt
maṇḍala rājāgrī nāma dvitīyaḥ samādhiḥ
evam dvātriśat devatā cakram abhinirmāya sūkṣma yogam bāhya ādhyātmika jāpam
ca kṛtvā punar ātmānam eva tathatāyām praveśayet

original: tato locanādica- turdevyo maṇḍalamadhye mahāsukhamapaśyantyo virahakhedavaśāt tvaṁ vajra- cittetyādigītikābhirmahāsukhaṁ prabodhayanti |
analyzed: tatas locana ādi ca tuḥ devyaḥ maṇḍala madhye mahā sukham a paśyantyaḥ viraha kheda vaśāt tvam vajra citta ityādi gītikābhiḥ mahā sukham prabodhayanti

original: tatreyaṁ gītikā- tvaṁ vajracitta bhuvaneśvara sattvadhāto trāyāhi māṁ ratimanojña mahārthakāmaiḥ |
analyzed: tatra iyam gītikā tvam vajracitta bhuvaneśvara sattvadhāto trāyāhi mām rati manojña mahā artha kāmaiḥ

original: kāmāhi māṁ janaka sattvamahāgrabandho yadīcchase jīvitu mhya nātha ||
analyzed: mām janaka sattva mahā agra bandho yadi icchase nātha

original: tvaṁ vajrakāya bahusattvapriyāṅkacakra buddhārtha bodhiparamārtha hitānudarśī |
analyzed: tvam vajrakāya bahu sattva priya aṅka cakra buddha artha bodhi parama artha hita anudarśī

original: rāgeṇa rāgasamayāṁ mama kāmayasva yadīcchase jīvitu mahya nātha ||
analyzed: rāgeṇa mama kāmayasva yadi icchase nātha

original: tvaṁ vajravāca sakalasya hitānukampī lokārthakāryakaraṇe sada sampravṛtta |
analyzed: tvam vajra vāca sakalasya hita anukampī loka artha kārya karaṇe sada sampravṛtta

original: (29) kāmāhi māṁ suratacarya samantabhadra yadīcchase jīvitu mahya nātha ||
analyzed: mām surata carya samanta bhadra yadi icchase nātha

original: tvaṁ vajrakāma samayāgra mahāhitārtha sambuddhavaṁśatilakaḥ samatānukampī |
analyzed: tvam vajra kāma samaya agra mahā hita artha sambuddha vaśa tilakaḥ samatā anukampī

original: kāmāhi māṁ guṇanidhiṁ bahuratnabhūtāṁ yadīcchase jīvitu mahya nātha ||
analyzed: mām guṇa nidhim bahu ratna bhūtām yadi icchase nātha

original: evaṁ sadbhūtaguṇena sañcodite sati pūrvapraṇidhānasāmarthyādvyutthitasya tathāgatāścākṣobhyetyādistotrarājaiḥ stuvanti |
analyzed: evam sat bhūta guṇena sañcodite sati pūrva praṇidhāna sāmarthyāt vyutthitasya tathāgatāḥ ca akṣobhya ityādi stotrarājaiḥ stuvanti

original: tatreyaṁ stutiḥ- akṣobhyavajra mahājñāna vajradhātu mahābudha |
analyzed: tatra iyam stutiḥ akṣobhya vajra mahā jñāna vajra dhātu mahā budha

original: trimaṇḍala trivajrāgra bhāṣa guhyaṁ namo'stu te ||
analyzed: tri maṇḍala tri vajra agra bhāṣa guhyam namaḥ astu te
vairocana mahā śuddha vajra śānta mahā rate
prakṛti prabhāsvarān dharmān deśa vajra namaḥ astu te
ratnarāja kha vajra ākāśa nirmala

original: svabhāvaśuddha nirlopa bhāṣa guhyaṁ namo'stu te ||
analyzed: svabhāva śuddha nirlopa bhāṣa guhyam namaḥ astu te
vajra amita mahā rāja nirvikalpa kha vajra dhṛk
rāga pāramitā prāpta bhāṣa vajra namaḥ astu te
amogha vajra sambuddha sarva āśā paripūraka
śuddha svabhāva sambhūta vajra sattva namaḥ astu te

original: tadanantaraṁ buddhajñānaṁ prakāśya maṇḍalacakramanurāgya pūrvavatsvakā- yamaṇḍale praveśyopasaṁhāraṁ kuryādanena krameṇa |
analyzed: tad anantaram buddha jñānam prakāśya maṇḍala cakram anurāgya pūrvavat sva kāya maṇḍale praveśya upasahāram kuryāt anena krameṇa

original: svahṛdayasthaṁ hūṁkāramu- ccārya tena sakalasattvadhātūnmahāvajradhararūpapariṇatānvicintya tanmana- sikāreṇa viharediti |
analyzed: sva hṛdaya stham hūkāram u ccārya tena sakala sattvadhātūn mahā vajradhara rūpa pariṇatān vicintya tad mana sikāreṇa viharet iti
asya sūtram daśama paṭale ākāśa dhātu madhya stham bhāvayet vyūha maṇḍalam
iti
evamādi karmikeṇa pratiṣṭhāpita samaya savareṇa abhiṣeka prāptena prākṛtāḥ haṅkāra apagatena catur sandhyā devatā yoga abhyāsena sva para artha sampādanaḥ
tsukena śānti karma ādi viśiṣṭataram api kartavyam

original: sādhanoktakrameṇā- hāraśodhanaṁ kaṇṭhaśodhanaṁ hṛdayaśodhanaṁ ca kṛtvāhārakṛtyaṁ kuryāt sukhena pariṇamati |
analyzed: sādhana ukta krameṇa ā hāra śodhanam kaṇṭha śodhanam hṛdaya śodhanam ca kṛtvā āhāra kṛtyam kuryāt sukhena pariṇamati

original: bāhyādhyātmikahomena tryakṣareṇa mālāmantreṇa vā mantrauṣadhiyogenenāpi padmavajrasamāyogena ca sarvakarma prasādhayet |
analyzed: bāhya ādhyātmika homena tri akṣareṇa mālāmantreṇa vā padma vajra samāyogena ca sarva karma prasādhayet
iti karmarājāgrī nāma tṛtīyaḥ samādhiḥ
śrī guhyasamāja mahā yogatantre bhava utpatti krameṇa vajra sattva niṣpādana sūtram samāptam
kṛtiḥ iyam ācārya candrakīrti pādānām
